channel.title: Stop with Ivana
channel.itunes:subtitle: Learning to Stop to go Further, Faster
channel.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek
channel.itunes:summary: More studies are being done about the benefits of stopping. Stopping to meditate, exercise, smell the flowers, distrupt our regular patterns in any form. This habit not only increases effectivness in our everyday activities, but also the creativity and satisfaction of what we are doing.
channel.description:
More studies are being done about the benefits of stopping. Stopping to meditate, exercise, smell the flowers, distrupt our regular patterns in any form. This habit not only increases effectivness in our everyday activities, but also the creativity and satisfaction of what we are doing.
If any questions or comments: support@ivanapazek.com. To get podcast Calendar, as well as other details visit: stopwithivana.com. Music: One Step Closer by Aakash Ghandi

item.title: Pod #1 Intro: Stopping Process
item.itunes:summary: Introductory recording to Stop with Ivana podcast, Season 1. In this recording you will learn about the overall process of STOPPING and discovering what is stopping you from moving forward.
item.description: Introductory recording to Stop with Ivana podcast, Season 1. In this recording you will learn about the overall process of STOPPING and discovering what is stopping you from moving forward.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #2: Sensations, Part 1
item.itunes:summary: In the first episode we start with letter S of the STOPPING process. Letter S stands for the core competency of dealing with sensations: our emotions, feelings, pains. In this recording you will learn different ways of dealing with sensations and a process to address them.
item.description: In the first episode we start with letter S of the STOPPING process. Letter S stands for the core competency of dealing with sensations: our emotions, feelings, pains. In this recording you will learn different ways of dealing with sensations and a process to address them.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #3: Sensations, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: In the second episode we continue with the letter S of the STOPPING process, the core competency for dealing with sensations: emotions, feelings and pains. We make a distinction between light and heavy, as well as comfortable and uncomfortable emotions.
item.description: In the second episode we continue with the letter S of the STOPPING process, the core competency for dealing with sensations: emotions, feelings and pains. We make a distinction between light and heavy, as well as comfortable and uncomfortable emotions.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #4: Sensations, Part 3
item.itunes:summary:
In the third part for Letter S of the STOPPING process, we address pains and connection of emotions and our physical body.
We also explore the meaning of different emotions and its possible messages.
item.description:
In the third part for Letter S of the STOPPING process, we address pains and connection of emotions and our physical body.
We also explore the meaning of different emotions and its possible messages.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #5: Thoughts, Part 1
item.itunes:summary:
In the second module of the Stopping process, we address thoughts. We start with the basic definition, what thoughts are and what aren't.
We will also talk about the best way to deal with our thoughts. Especially when we cannot control our thoughts.
item.description:
In the second module of the Stopping process, we address thoughts. We start with the basic definition, what thoughts are and what aren't.
We will also talk about the best way to deal with our thoughts. Especially when we cannot control our thoughts.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #6: Thoughts, Part 2
item.itunes:summary:
In the second part of Thoughts module, we address the next steps in dealing with thoughts. We also talk about the relationship between thoughts and beliefs, and the power of thoughts.
Lastly, the practical exercise is given to accelerate our learning. If any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@ivanapazek.com.
item.description:
In the second part of Thoughts module, we address the next steps in dealing with thoughts. We also talk about the relationship between thoughts and beliefs, and the power of thoughts.
Lastly, the practical exercise is given to accelerate our learning. If any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at support@ivanapazek.com.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #7: Thoughts, Part 3
item.itunes:summary: In the last part of Thoughts module, we address 3 phases of dealing with thoughts. We also look at dealing with our thoughts as a skill, and discuss thought states.
item.description: In the last part of Thoughts module, we address 3 phases of dealing with thoughts. We also look at dealing with our thoughts as a skill, and discuss thought states.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #8: Oneself, Part 1
item.itunes:summary: In the first part of Oneself module, we address the basics of oneself by looking at its definitions and labels.
item.description: In the first part of Oneself module, we address the basics of oneself by looking at its definitions and labels.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #9: Oneself, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: In the second part of the Oneself module, we talk about skills and gifts associated with two main personality types.
item.description: In the second part of Oneself module, we talk about skills and gifts associated with two main personality types.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #10: Oneself, Part 3
item.itunes:summary: In the last part of Oneself module, we talk about the importance of feeling deserving, going deeper into our own self esteem and confidence levels. In the end is given the exercise to improve your own sense of value. If any questions or comments email to: support@ivanapazek.com. To get podcast Calendar, as well as other details visit: stopwithivana.com. Music: One Step Closer by Aakash Ghandi.
item.description: In the last part of Oneself module, we talk about the importance of feeling deserving, going deeper into our own self esteem and confidence levels. In the end the exercise is given to improve your own sense of value. If any questions or comments email to: support@ivanapazek.com. To get podcast Calendar, as well as other details visit: stopwithivana.com. Music: One Step Closer by Aakash Ghandi.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #11: Present, Past, Part 1
item.itunes:summary: In the first part for the Letter P of the STOPPING process, we talk about the Present: the importance of embracing where we are in this moment, to get where we want to be faster and easier.
item.description: In the first part for the Letter P of the STOPPING process, we talk about the Present: the importance of embracing where we are in this moment, to get where we want to be faster and easier.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #12: Present, Past, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: In the second recording of the Letter P of the STOPPING process, we talk about the Past: our early childhood traumas and its effects for us today, as well as 4 Fs: Fight, Flight, Freeze and Fawn, automatic responses we may operate from as a response to difficult situations.
item.description: In the second recording of the Letter P of the STOPPING process, we talk about the Past: our early childhood traumas and its effects for us today, as well as 4 Fs: Fight, Flight, Freeze and Fawn, automatic responses we may operate from as a response to difficult situations.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #13: Present, Past, Part 3
item.itunes:summary: In the last recording of the Letter P of the STOPPING process, we talk about one of the most powerful tools of the present moment: Gratitude. Besides talking about the benefits of the Gratitude and taking our time to stop, we go through the Gratitude meditation which can be used as a daily exercise.
item.description: In the last recording of the Letter P of the STOPPING process, we talk about one of the most powerful tools of the present moment: Gratitude. Besides talking about the benefits of the Gratitude and taking our time to stop, we go through the Gratitude meditation which can be used as a daily exercise.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #14: Intention, Part 1
item.itunes:summary: In the first recording of the Letter I of the STOPPING process, we talk about the basics of connecting with our future through the intention.
item.description: In the first recording of the Letter I of the STOPPING process, we talk about the basics of connecting with our future through the intention.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #15: Intention, Part 2
item.itunes:summary: In the second recording for the Letter I of the STOPPING process, we talk about setting the intention for the future event important to us to go well.
item.description: In the second recording for the Letter I of the STOPPING process, we talk about setting the intention for the future event important to us to go well.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #16: Intention, Part 3
item.itunes:summary: In the last recording for the Letter I of the STOPPING process, we talk about the basics of the Law of Attraction and its usage in our every day life.
item.description: In the last recording for the Letter I of the STOPPING process, we talk about the basics of the Law of Attraction and its usage in our every day life.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek

item.title: Pod #17: Non-resistance & Go, Part 1
item.itunes:summary: In the first recording of the last part of the STOPPING process, we talk about the importance of Non-resistance - to what is currently in our life, to what happened, what we expect to happen, as well as non-resistance to who we are. The Non-resistance encompasses all we learned so far and is a prerequisit to taking any conscious decision or action.
item.description: In the first recording of the last part of the STOPPING process, we talk about the importance of Non-resistance - to what is currently in our life, to what happened, what we expect to happen, as well as non-resistance to who we are. The Non-resistance encompasses all we learned so far and is a prerequisit to taking any conscious decision or action.
item.itunes:author: Ivana Pazek
